name: 🔳Stereo🧊 Covid19 - ☄️💥🔥3D stereo animation
description: Can you see the Covid-19 virus in 3D? This is a nicely crafted stereogram animation, made frame by frame. The virus is invisible to naked eye, just like in this animation. You need to squint a little bit to see the 3D object. Short rest helps to regenerate tired eye muscles. Do not try at home! 07/06/2021
